entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Snow mixed with freezing rain beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
